events.message: The client submitted a complete application form for financing a new vehicle, specifying model and payment terms.
Loan application was categorized under Auto Loan based on keywords indicating purchase of a car and vehicle details.
Assigned experienced loan officer to handle the client's auto loan query for better communication and support.
Conducted a preliminary review of the application documents and loan details to verify completeness and eligibility.
Requested additional proof of income and recent pay stubs from the applicant to support credit evaluation.
Applicant submitted all requested documents promptly, including income verification and identification papers.
Credit report was obtained showing a strong credit history with timely payments and low debt-to-income ratio.
Risk assessment concluded medium-low risk level based on financial stability and creditworthiness of the applicant.
Presented loan offer including interest rate and payment schedule tailored to the applicantâ€™s preferences and credit profile.
Applicant responded positively, expressing satisfaction with the offer and asking for minor clarifications on monthly installments.
Escalated application to senior management for approval given loan amount slightly exceeds standard threshold.
Senior management approved the loan application after reviewing all documentation and risk assessments thoroughly.
Funds were successfully transferred to the dealership as per contract, enabling the applicant to complete the vehicle purchase.
Followed up with the applicant to confirm receipt of funds and satisfaction with loan terms and vehicle acquisition.
Closed the application file after successful funding and completion of follow-up activities ensuring all conditions met.
